title: Are there some apps that anyone cannot create? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe that, “There is nothing impossible in this world”. Lets address your question. Two things required to create application Skill set (Programming languages, concepts)Experience (Portfolio)Example: There are two programmers, 1st one Mobile App and 2nd Web Developer. So, question is can Web Developer create Mobile application? My answer is Yes, Web Developer create Mobile application but it needs to grasp some concepts of mobile development and that’s not a big deal. Conclusion: There are some application’ like Deep Learning, Neural Network, embedded computing etc. These types of applications cannot be created without specialist.
